description: Watch as Argentina face Sweden and follow updates from South Africa v Italy in Group G at the 2023 Women's World Cup.
title: Argentina vs Sweden LIVE: Watch Fifa Women's World Cup 2023 plus score, commentary & updates in Group G game
title_page: Argentina vs Sweden LIVE: Watch Fifa Women's World Cup 2023 plus score, commentary & updates in Group G game - BBC Sport
maintext:
Report - South Africa seal historic win
FT: South Africa 3-2 Italy
South Africa are through to the last 16 after claiming their first Women's World Cup win with a thrilling 3-2 victory over Italy.
Thembi Kgatlana's 93rd-minute winner proved the difference after Italy fought back to level with a Arianna Caruso header.
A draw would have been enough to take Italy into the knockout rounds.
South Africa will play Group E winners the Netherlands on Sunday.
Read the full report here.
Post
FT: South Africa 3-2 Italy
There's South Africa and Italy players on their knees on the pitch, the former in tears of happiness, the latter in tears of sadness after seeing a place in the knockouts slip away from them.
Frustration for Italy, but what a moment for South Africa.

Wayne: Clear high foot there by a South African player in the buildup, shocked that goal is allowed to stand
The Armchair Football Fan: Not been a huge amount of quality in this game but in flashes there has been some real entertainment, and who doesn't love the drama
